oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of indicators as tools of decision-making
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yli-Viikari, Anja
Savisalo, Leena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There appears to be several ways to use the indicators. In a complex policy context such as natural resource management indicators are foremost communicative tools for demonstrating issues that are already known ones. Successfully used, indicators may be tools for crystallizing the key of information flows. Contrary to technical use of indicators the circumstances of information utilization need to be emphasized in a complex policy context. Critical point of indicator's approach lies also in making of the interpretations. Finally, there are also power aspects, which should be noted for.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Yli-Viikari, Anja and Savisalo, Leena (2004) Use of indicators as tools of decision-making. In: (Pre)Proceedings of the 6th European IFSA symposium, pp. 879-882.
